text: is a Japanese city in Aichi Prefecture on the island of Honshu. It is known as the site of the 2005 World Exposition. The Toyota Automobile Museum is in Nagakute.Japan National Tourist Organization (JNTO), Seto/Nagakute. Retrieved 2012-3-23. ==History== ===Timeline=== * 1584 (Tenshō 12): Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005). "Komaki Nagakute no Tataka" in Japan encyclopedia, p. 553. * 2005 (Heisei 17): Expo 2005 World ExpositionExpo 2005, homepage. Retrieved 2012-3-13. ==Geography== Nagakute is to the east of Nagoya. ==Related pages == * Seto, Aichi ==References== == Other websites == * Nagakute City Homepage (in Japanese, select English) * Aichi Shukutoku University Category:Cities in Aichi Prefecture
title: Nagakute
